text: Pim Verbeek (12 March 1956 - 28 November 2019) was a Dutch football player turned coach. His brother Robert Verbeek is also a football coach. The Korea Football Association signed him to a coaching contract on 26 June 2000 . He was appointed as coach of Oman at 2016, after Oman's failure to qualify for the 2018 FIFA World Cup. On 12 February 2019, Sparta Rotterdam announced that they had reached an agreement with Pim Verbeek about joining the club as a member of the board.PIM VERBEEK COMPLETEERT BESTUUR SPARTA ROTTERDAM, sparta- rotterdam.nl, 12 February 2019 Verbeek died of cancer on 28 November 2019 at the age of 63.Former Socceroos coach Pim Verbeek dies aged 63 after cancer battle ==Managerial statistics== J.League Data Site Team From To Record G W D L Win % Omiya Ardija 1999 1999 Kyoto Purple Sanga 2003 2003 Total ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Dutch football managers Category:Footballers from Rotterdam Category:FC Groningen managers
title: Pim Verbeek
